preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM (SELECT 1 FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name IN ('IMPORT_GERMPLASM', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM', 'GERMPLASM', 'MODIFY_NAMES', 'EDIT_GERMPLASM', 'CROP_MANAGEMENT', 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA') GROUP BY rp.role_id HAVING SUM(p.name = 'CROP_MANAGEMENT') = 0 AND SUM(p.name = 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA') = 0) AS count;

changeSet.comment: Add 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA' for everyone who has 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM' or 'MODIFY_NAMES' permission
changeSet.sql:
SET @permission_id = (SELECT permission_id FROM permission WHERE name = 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA');
INSERT INTO role_permission(role_id, permission_id) SELECT role_id, @permission_id FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name IN ('IMPORT_GERMPLASM', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM', 'GERMPLASM', 'MODIFY_NAMES', 'EDIT_GERMPLASM', 'CROP_MANAGEMENT', 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA') GROUP BY rp.role_id HAVING SUM(p.name = 'CROP_MANAGEMENT') = 0 AND SUM(p.name = 'MANAGE_CROP_METADATA') = 0;
